inclusion.criterion: Neonates 37 weeks or more gestation at birth
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age of parent/ person with parental responsibility being at least 16 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinically well parent/ person with parental responsibility
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: English Speaking parent/ person with parental responsibility
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Maternal SSRI use at any point in pregnancy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Neonates less than 37 weeks gestation at birth
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Age of parent/ person with parental responsibility under 16 years old
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan who comes to clinic with some general and non-specific bones and joints pain. Her past medical and drug history are unremarkable.
